_meta.description: Defines which laws are reclassified as advisory_experimental based on acquisition method. Advisory laws cannot issue VETO verdicts.

rules.rationale: Bond RMSZ depends on resolution and refinement protocol. False vetoes expected across all experimental methods.
Chain Integrity: multi-chain gap false positives pending coordinate discontinuity fix.
Non-standard residues (ligands, nucleotides, modified residues) are expected in Cryo-EM maps.
Ramachandran: ensemble averaging broadens phi/psi distributions in NMR.
Rotamer Audit: ensemble averaging in NMR produces non-rotameric side-chain snapshots.
Non-standard residues may appear in NMR buffer conditions.
